name: PACSTUDENT VS. THE MUTANT SLIME HORROR
name_original: PACSTUDENT VS. THE MUTANT SLIME HORROR
description:
What is this?

This is a project that I created for the subject 31263 Introduction to Computer Game Development at the University of Technology Sydney in 2022. It is a recreation of the classic "Pacman" with different visuals, audio, and enemy behaviour. Level 2 has a new, additional gameplay mechanic that puts a spin on the core game. 

Gameplay

Never played Pacman before? 

  • Consume all of the green pellets to complete the level.  
  • Evade the mutant slimes.
  • Absorb the orbs to make them fear you.
  • Get caught too many times and you become one of them.
  • Collect flasks and defeat enemies to get bonus points! :D

What's in Level 2?

  • The surrounding shadow creeps closer and closer as time marches onward.
  • Absorb the orbs and flasks to restore the light.
Controls

Use the WASD keys to move around. Use the mouse to navigate the menu.
